snippet: Xi Jinping praised the unit that oversees the land-based ballistic and cruise missiles of China’s nuclear force, in the latest indication that he is moving quickly to solidify control of the military.
abstract: China's new leader Xi Jinping meets with officers of military unit that oversees land-based ballistic and cruise missiles of China's nuclear force; meeting is latest indication that Xi is moving quickly to solidify his control of armed forces.
lead_paragraph: Xi Jinping praised the unit that oversees the land-based ballistic and cruise missiles of China’s nuclear force, in the latest indication that he is moving quickly to solidify control of the military.

headline.seo: Xi Jinping Meets Officers of Military Nuclear Unit
headline.main: New Chinese Leader Meets Military Nuclear Officers
headline.print_headline: New Chinese Leader Meets Military Nuclear Officers
